name: Daddy’s Home
content: You're the girl of my dreams
How I've waited for this moment
Your best friend wrote and told me
You had teardrops in your eyes
Now It wasn't on a Sunday
It wasn't on a Tuesday afternoon
All I could do was cry
I made a promise that you treasure
And I've made it home back  to you
How I've waited for this moment
Your best friend wrote and told me
You had teardrops in your eyes
I'm not a thousand miles away
And I'm gonna be here Come with me
